kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: The chromedriver version (140.0.7339.185) detected in PATH at /opt/homebrew/bin/chromedriver might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (141.0.7390.108); currently, chromedriver 141.0.7390.78 is recommended for chrome 141.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.
